instructions: Guess the wird in {{tries}} goes. Efter each go, the colour o the letters will change tae show hou close yer guess wis tae the wird.
correctSpotInstructions: The letter A is in the wird and in that spot.
wrongSpotInstructions: The letter N is in the wird but no in that spot.
notInWordInstructions: The letter C is no in the word at aa.
aboutAuthorSentence: This is an open source clone o the speil Wordle adapted tae Scots by Dictionars o the Scots Leid in collaboration wi <3>{{author}}</3>.
aboutCodeSentence: Check oot <1>the original code</1> by <3>Hannah Park</3> or hae a look at <5>Aidan Pine's fork</5> and customize it for another language!
aboutDataSentence: The wirds for this speil were sourced fae <1>{{wordListSource}}</1>.
aboutOriginalSentence: You can also play the original  <1>here</1>
